document.full_text: new york city should require its retired public employees to pay for medicare part b premiums -- the way all but four states do -- instead of fully reimbursing them, according to a report released on wednesday by a fiscal watchdog group.
document.title: nyc public retirees should pay health premiums: watchdog
lines_and_colors: new york city should require its retired public employees to pay for medicare part b premiums -- the way all but four states do -- instead of fully reimbursing them, according to a report released on wednesday by a fiscal watchdog group.
